name: Archer Master (itch) (Phạm Phú Phi Phương)
description:
Thank for play my prototype game (2 days worked).

Made for the Game Jams but I don't have time to participate now. The game will revolve around a female character holding a bow to shoot monsters, collecting items to fight off a larger series of monsters at high levels.

After Game Jams is over, if you want me to continue to develop the game, please comment and give your constructive ideas.

Have fun playing! Sorry if you are inconvenienced by the bug :>

MISSING FEATURES

- Arow effect

- Spell

- Boss fight

- ....
